reviews.text: This is one of Super 8's premier sites, and it shows. Good sized rooms with nice furnishings, and it feels quite new. I'm a light sleeper and asked for a room away from the road, Front desk was quick and helpful in organising this, and they also fixed the wifi very quickly, which had failed following a power cut. Room is well equipped with fridge and microwave, and unlike some places, the fridge ran quietly during the night.
reviews.title: Good quality Super8

reviews.text: Laundry area on 3rd floor is clean and works well, but as it is in a corridor I wouldn't want the room next door to it in case guests like me are using it at 11pm.
reviews.title: Again-Pleasant

likes.liked: — clean rooms, clean bathrooms, friendly staff

reviews.text: Breakfast was well presented and re-provisioned regularly as it was in heavy demand on that morning.
reviews.title: Not bad
